body.name: PHF 3 Pieces Waffle Weave Comforter Set Queen Size, Lightweight Breathable Comfy Bedding Set for All Season, Ultra Soft Textured Comforter Set with 2 Pillow Shams, Black
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Thursday, February 15. Order within 16 mins
features: Waffle Weave Texture: Classic yet stylish waffle weave design features three-dimensional, puffy and elegant appearance, brings casual sophistication and create a soothing retreat. Available in various colors, these comforter set perfectly complement any home décor. Just add a fresh layer to your bedroom with our waffle weave comforter set.

Soft and Breathable: Our comforter set crafted from premium synthetic fiber material, waffle woven design on the surface, and soft high quality microfiber on its reverse, that combines long-lasting durability with silky softness and excellent breathability. This extra fluffy comforter set features lightweight polyester filling that offers the perfect temperature for any season.

All Seasons Comfort: 260 GSM down alternative filling of the comforter creates an appropriate thickness with the right amount of weight meanwhile offer proper warmth and good puff. Not too thick, not too thin, no overheating and lightweight without any rustling noise, combine with a sturdy quilting process that Securely keep your belongings in place while preserving the beauty of the design, ensuring a restful night's sleep.Enjoy all year round comfort with PHF comforter set.

What You'll Get: Queen bedding set includes 1 comforter 90" x 90", 2 pillow shams 20" x 26", fits Full/Queen sizes. Our bed in a bag is packaged in a vacuum bag. To restore its cozy feel after unpacking, simply tumble dry on low heat or gently tap the comforter while basking in the sun to fluff it up.

Easy Care: Machine wash separately in cold water, gentle cycle. Do not bleach. Tumble dry on low heat or lay flat to dry. Remove promptly. Warm iron as needed. No pilling, no shrink, no fade, labor tests show that the comforter set keep its shape and stay brands new after 100+ wash cycles.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewText: The 3-Piece Waffle Weave Comforter Set in Sage Green has transformed my bedroom into a haven of tranquility. This lightweight and breathable bedding ensemble offer not only comfort but also a touch of sophistication to elevate my sleeping space.The waffle weave texture adds a subtle yet luxurious dimension to the comforter, providing visual interest and a delightful tactile experience. The sage green hue complements various bedroom aesthetics, creating a serene and inviting atmosphere.Designed for all seasons, the comforter strikes the perfect balance between warmth and breathability, ensuring a comfortable night's sleep year-round. The ultra-soft fabric enhances the overall coziness, making it a haven to retreat to at the end of the day.The set includes two matching pillow shams that effortlessly tie the entire look together. The attention to detail in both design and construction reflects the quality of this bedding ensemble, promising durability and lasting comfort.In summary, the 3-Piece Waffle Weave Comforter Set for King Size beds is a delightful investment for those seeking a blend of style and comfort. Its lightweight, breathable, and textured design, coupled with the calming sage green color, creates a serene sleep sanctuary that beckons relaxation in every season.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very attractive, unique texture, and soft
reviews.reviewText: I was not familiar with waffle weave design before, but I find it to be a subtle, yet noticeable stylish improvement over a standard smooth comforter.This comforter is not as thick as most, but definitely adds noticeable warmth, and our son says that when combined only with a top sheet, makes for a comfortable sleep in his upstairs room that runs colder in the winter.The back side is smooth, by contrast, and is comfortable against your skin. We did not use the pillow shams as we don’t have extra pillows on that bed, but it’s the same material as the comforter, but without the filling.So if you’re looking for a lightweight, warm and unique comforter, this is an absolutely solid choice.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great bedspread ample size
reviews.reviewText: This fit beautifully on my king size bed. Usually they aren’t as big as I want but this is perfect! Good quality, heavier than I expected but nice and warm. It came with shams too but I chose to use my other shames for contrast. Love it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I'm mostly a fan of this comforter. The fabric is soft, and the color is really nice (it looks much greener in person than it does in my pictures.The comforter is thick and fluffy, but doesn't make me overheat.The pillow cases are for King Sized pillows, and they fit perfectly.My only complaint is that the tag is on the side of the comforter instead of the bottom. Usually when I put sheets or comforters on the bed, I look for the tag because then I know where the bottom is, but when I did that with this set, the comforter was too short on the two sides. But then when I rotated it so that the tag was on the side, it fit perfectly. Not a huge deal, just odd.Overall, I'd recommend this Comforter set.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars So light and pretty with lots of texture.
reviews.reviewText: I'm a sucker for a white bed. There's something so classic and airy about it. I've traditionally bought all white linens for our bed and have long been on the lookout for a waffle-weave addition to my bedding. Enter this set, and I'm totally in love. The texture adds so much interest beyond a plain white linen duvet and it really made our primary bedroom into a haven. I can't rave enough about how expensive this looks.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Large enough to cover the sides
reviews.reviewText: This is the perfect size for a king bed. That might sound odd but my last two king-size comforters felt more like queen size. They didn’t cover all the way down the sides of the mattress. This one perfectly fits the mattress all the way around and goes down on the side to cover the mattress.The waffle weave also looks great. Don’t love king size pillows, but understand that’s the size of pillowcase that comes with all king size blankets.This is a nice weight because it provides a bit more than a coverlet, but not as much as a thick comforter. Good mid weight option!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I have a lot of king size blankets but i don’t ever feel like it covers the entire bed. This blanket hanged on both sides and at the bottom of my bed and I still have enough at the top. You can see the definition within the blanket. It’s nice and warm too

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewText: We ordered this set for my teenage daughter who asked for a little room upgrade. The linen color is really beautiful, it keeps the color light, but hides a little more than white would (especially for a messy teen). When we recieved the package, we thought we got the wrong item because it was meant to be a whole comforter and not just a cover, but it just comes nicely packaged in air tight plastic, so once we fully opened it, it expanded to an appropriate size. My daughter said the blanket keeps her the perfect temperature at night, not too hot but warm enough to be cozy. The material is very soft to the touch. GREAT VALUE!
